p: Makassar is representative of many rapidly urbanizing tropical cities in supporting an abundance of mosquito oviposition sites, especially for Ae. aegypti. It is also representative in being at high dengue risk. Its seasonal rainfall schedule can be predicted with considerable certainty, making the described protocol feasible. As seen in the data for 1999â€“2006, cycles of rainfall, Aedes density, and human dengue cases were correlated.
